events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund because this is not what I paid for.
The issue has been categorized under the Refund cluster due to the customer's request for money back.
An agent from the refunds team has been assigned to handle the customer's case regarding their request.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear about the wrong item. Let's work together to get this sorted out for you as soon as possible.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received along with your order number so I can look into this further?
Here is the photo of the item I got, and my order number is 847362. I hope this helps resolve the issue.
Thank you for the details. We will process a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and the refund offer. I appreciate your help resolving this quickly.
The refund has been confirmed and the case is now closed. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm you received your refund and everything is in order. Please reach out if you have any other questions.
This support case regarding your refund request has been formally closed. Thank you for contacting us.
We appreciate your feedback. Please complete this short survey to let us know how we handled your refund case.
